Uses of Interface
com.justinkleiber.motor.base.SpriteSheet

  • Packages that use SpriteSheet 
    Package Description
    com.justinkleiber.motor.base
    Package for interfacing with the hardware
    com.justinkleiber.motor.controllers
    Package for controlling the game and hardware

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Graphics.animateSheetByIndex(SpriteSheet ss, int start, int end, int delay, boolean shouldStart, float angle)
      Animates a SpriteSheet from one index to another without regard for rows or columns.
      void Graphics.animateSheetColumn(SpriteSheet ss, int x, int y, int col)
      Animates a Static Rotation SpriteSheet column
      void Graphics.animateSheetColumn(SpriteSheet ss, int x, int y, int col, int delay)
      Animates a Static Rotation SpriteSheet column with a delay The delay feature may have unexpected results because it is not integrated with the draw functions
      void Graphics.animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss, float x, float y, int row, int delay, float angle)
      Animate a Dynamic Rotation SpriteSheet Row (origin point is at the center of Sprite for best rotation results) with a delay
      void Graphics.animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss, float x, float y, int row, int delay, int delayIndex, float angle)
      Another way to animate a SpriteSheet row with a delay
      void Graphics.animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss, int row, int delay)
      Animates a Static Rotation SpriteSheet row with a delay, assuming Position is defined
      void Graphics.animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss, int row, int delay, float angle)
      Animate a Dynamic Rotation SpriteSheet Row (origin point is at the center of Sprite for best rotation results) with a delay This assumes Position is already defined
      void Graphics.animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss, int x, int y, int row)
      Animates a Static Rotation SpriteSheet row
      void Graphics.animateSheetRow(SpriteSheet ss, int x, int y, int row, int delay)
      Animates a Static Rotation SpriteSheet row with a delay The delay feature may have unexpected results because it is not integrated with the draw functions
      void Graphics.animateSpriteSheetToCoordinates(SpriteSheet s, int row, int col, int cx, int cy, int x, int y, float pace, float angle)
      Animates a Dynamic Rotation SpriteSheet to a point
      void Graphics.animateSpriteSheetToPosition(SpriteSheet s, int row, int col, Position p, float pace)
      Animates a SpriteSheet Sprite to a position on the screen
      void Graphics.drawSpriteSheet(SpriteSheet ss, int row, int col)
      Draws a Static Rotation SpriteSheet, whose origin point is in the top left of the Sprite being drawn This function assumes that the position is defined
      void Graphics.drawSpriteSheet(SpriteSheet ss, int x, int y, int row, int col)
      Draws a Static Rotation SpriteSheet, whose origin point is in the top left of the Sprite being drawn
      boolean Collision.isCollisionExist(SpriteSheet ss, SpriteSheet tt)
      This function is under development, Do not use it
      boolean Collision.isCollisionExist(Sprite s, SpriteSheet ss)
      This function is under development, Do not use it
      boolean Collision.isInPosition(SpriteSheet ss, Position p)
      Detects if a SpriteSheet is in a certain Position
      boolean Collision.isInPosition(SpriteSheet ss, Position p, int tolerance)
